rows.label: qev041501_MSG0001
rows.name: Hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0002
rows.name: HmmmMMMM?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Passerby friend, Chirochiro feel like we met
somewhere looong time ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0004
rows.name: Hmmmmm... HMMMMMMM...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ah HA! It was when Chirochiro had fight with girl
who used shiny-smooth skin lotion and wound up with
shiny-smooth head![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Friend stepped in and stopped her from clawing out
eyes of Chirochiro. Ah, good times...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0007
rows.name: Chirochiro has been on looong journey ever since.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Journey to find way to grow back hair of girl,
considering Chirochiro can't afford the 10,000
credits in damages she demands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0009
rows.name: But no one has baldness cure for sale...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, some people DO, but after careful investigating,
Chirochiro see they are all scams.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0011
rows.name: But Chirochiro never give up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0012
rows.name: If no one else has cure, Chirochiro just make one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0013
rows.name: And at long last, Chirochiro finally find it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0014
rows.name:
The legendary ingredient with miraculous properties of
shagginess![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0015
rows.name:
But it take more than just one of them to make cure.
And searching has taken Chirochiro foreeeeever...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0016
rows.name:
BUT! Meh! Chirochiro finally has ingredients ready.
Which mean it is CURE TIME![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0017
rows.name:
Er, however, it seem Chirochiro was too focused on
ingredient hunting to notice how far she wandered,
and ended up in this middle of no place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0018
rows.name:
So Chirochiro was just searching for way home.
...Without much success.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0019
rows.name: But then friend showed up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Will friend please take Chirochiro back to NLA to
see the shiny-smooth lady?[ST:wait ]
